name: Squp
description:
Squp : in search of light

Squp is a little cube looking for his lost in the dark. 

He needs a companion on this journey and that's you.
Squp is a minimal puzzle game based on innovation that also contains arcade mods, you can break records and challenge your mind and speed.
You face different challenges in the levels and if you are interested in puzzle games it will entertain you for a long time.


Squp is a game about some simple cubes but they lead you into a picturesque world.

Developed by   from
